snippet: Archbishop John Nienstedt is stepping aside while authorities investigate an allegation that he inappropriately touched a boy’s buttocks during a 2009 group photo session.
abstract: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of St Paul and Minneapolis issues statement that Archbishop John Nienstedt is stepping aside while authorities investigate allegation that he inappropriately touched boy's buttocks during 2009 group photo session.
lead_paragraph: Archbishop John Nienstedt is stepping aside while authorities investigate an allegation that he inappropriately touched a boy’s buttocks during a 2009 group photo session.
